(r^41)+41(r^40)(t^1)+820(r^39)(t^2)+10660(r^38)(t^3)+101270(r^37)(t^4)+749398(r^36)(t^5)+4496388(r^35)(t^6)+22481940(r^34)(t^7)+95548245(r^33)(t^8)+350343565(r^32)(t^9)+1121099408(r^31)(t^10)+3159461968(r^30)(t^11)+7898654920(r^29)(t^12)+17620076360(r^28)(t^13)+35240152720(r^27)(t^14)+63432274896(r^26)(t^15)+103077446706(r^25)(t^16)+151584480450(r^24)(t^17)+202112640600(r^23)(t^18)+244662670200(r^22)(t^19)+269128937220(r^21)(t^20)+269128937220(r^20)(t^21)+244662670200(r^19)(t^22)+202112640600(r^18)(t^23)+151584480450(r^17)(t^24)+103077446706(r^16)(t^25)+63432274896(r^15)(t^26)+35240152720(r^14)(t^27)+17620076360(r^13)(t^28)+7898654920(r^12)(t^29)+3159461968(r^11)(t^30)+1121099408(r^10)(t^31)+350343565(r^9)(t^32)+95548245(r^8)(t^33)+22481940(r^7)(t^34)+4496388(r^6)(t^35)+749398(r^5)(t^36)+101270(r^4)(t^37)+10660(r^3)(t^38)+820(r^2)(t^39)+41(r^1)(t^40)+(t^41)
